## Mesh.setBoneMatrices() method

Sets the texture that contains the bone matrices for skeletal animation

**Signature:**

```typescript
setBoneMatrices(matrices: Texture2D): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  matrices | [Texture2D](doc/markdown/./device.texture2d.md) | The texture that contains the bone matrices |

**Returns:**

void
